descriptions:
Squirrel House/Nesting Box – easy to use, ready to hang.

- What it is: A cozy little home for the squirrels in your yard.
- Material: Cedar wood. Cedar is strong, weathers well, and has a pleasant natural smell.
- For outdoors: Safe to use outside all year.

Easy to set up:
- Comes with the hardware you need: 2 screws and 2 washers.
- Two pre-drilled holes make mounting simple.
- You can hang it on a tree, post, or sturdy fence.

Easy to clean:
- The roof lifts off. This makes it simple to check inside or clean when needed.

Strong construction:
- Made with both glue and nails for extra durability.

Thoughtful design:
- Round entrance hole is about 3.5 inches across—just right for squirrels.
- Outside size: about 12 inches wide, 11 inches high, and 10 inches deep.
- Inside size: about 5.75 inches wide and 9 inches deep, giving squirrels a snug, protected space.
- Features a tasteful burned image of a squirrel by artist Drew Senesac on the front.

Why you’ll like it:
- Helps local wildlife find a safe nesting spot.
- Cedar wood resists rot and insects, so it lasts.
- Simple to mount and simple to maintain.

What’s in the box:
- Squirrel house with removable roof.
- 2 mounting screws and 2 washers.

Tip: Mount the box 8–12 feet above the ground on a tree or post, facing away from strong winds. Check the house once or twice a year by lifting the roof to keep it clean and welcoming.

Bring a bit of nature closer to home with this sturdy, easy-to-use Squirrel House/Nesting Box.
